title: What Was The CIA Doing? (Ep 1707)
description:
In this episode I address the disturbing role of the CIA in the plot to spy on Donald Trump. I also address the latest moves on the Canadian truckers. 

News Picks:


A sneak peek at Trump’s new social media platform.

The unstated CIA scandal of the Spygate affair.

Democrats are tiring of Joe Biden too.

I warned you about NY City Mayor Eric Adams.
